directions: Place romaine lettuce in a large bowl. Add tomato, avocado, cucumber, feta cheese, onion, corn, and black beans; toss well. Sprinkle tortilla chips over salad.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; drizzle over salad.
ingredients: 1/4 cup crushed tortilla chips, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste (optional)
title: Baja Salad
